Description: We are excited to announce that Brickstone Real Estate Company is hiring for the position of Senior Property Consultant with experience in the real estate industry. We are seeking a qualified candidate who has:1. Must have a minimum of 1/2 years of professional experience working in the real estate industry within Dubai,2. Fluency in English.3. Excellent organizational skills with outstanding interpersonal abilities4. Team Player with a positive attitude5. Strong negotiable and communication skills 6. A UAE Driving license is a mustThe ideal candidate will be responsible for finding prospective clients, understanding their criteria, and finding living spaces that fit these criteria. You will then negotiate rent and drive our buyers to close. Your entrepreneurial spirit will drive your success to Negotiate living space rent and close deals with client*This job is only commission-based role, we offer an attractive commission package starting with 65 % commission.Skills
Skills: Being a successful Real Estate Agent requires a unique combination of skills and qualities. Here are a few that I believe are essential:
Ø Having good time management and organizational skills
Ø Stay up-to-date with real estate market trends and industry best practices;
Ø Effective communication skills and the ability to confidently persuade others.
Ø Able to communicate effectively and confidently persuade others, with strong interpersonal skills.
